title: Introduction to Generative AI
excerpt: Understanding how generative models create new content, from text to images, and revolutionize creative industries.
content:
What is Generative AI?

Generative AI represents a paradigm shift in how machines create content.

How It Works

Using advanced neural networks, generative models learn patterns from training data to create entirely new, original content.

Applications

From art generation to code completion, generative AI is transforming creative workflows.

Popular Models

GPT-4, DALL-E, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion are leading the generative AI revolution.
